body_html:
@peterjc123
win8.1 conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch cuda80 (done)

Run setup https://github.com/DmitryUlyanov/deep-image-prior/blob/master/denoising.ipynb >>>
AssertionError: Torch not compiled with CUDA enabled

Any help is very much appreciated.
